text: Bad Boy Records (also known as Bad Boy Entertainment) is an American record label of hip hop and R&B.; It was founded in 1993 by rapper/producer Sean Combs. It is a part of Epic Records, a division of Sony Music. It had late rappers Craig Mack and The Notorious B.I.G.. Faith Evans, 112, Total, The Lox, Mase, Shyne and Carl Thomas are also on the label. ==References== Category:1990s establishments in New York (state) Category:1993 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in New York City Category:American record labels
title: Bad Boy Records
